inclusion.criterion: Patients with thyroid diseases amenable of surgical resection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with any gender or ethnical origin
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Postoperative follow-up of at least 2 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients competent to understand and sign the informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with clinical or biochemical hyperthyroidism
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Preoperative indication for lateral lymph node dissection (radical modified)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of gross tracheal or laryngeal invasion with thyroid cancer
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Preoperative vocal cord paralysis or laryngeal disease
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer, but meets inclusion criteria for surgical resection and is competent to sign informed consent.
